abort.missing_configuration: The component is not configured. Please follow the documentation.
abort.no_url_available: No URL available. For information about this error, [check the help section]({docs_url})
abort.oauth_unauthorized: OAuth authorization error while obtaining access token.

reauth_confirm.title: Do you want to start setup?

custom_cleaning.description: Zone cleaning action specific to Neato Botvacs.

category.description: Whether to use a persistent map or not for cleaning (i.e. No go lines): 2 for no map, 4 for map. Default to using map if not set (and fallback to no map if no map is found).
category.name: Use cleaning map

mode.description: Set the cleaning mode: 1 for eco and 2 for turbo. Defaults to turbo if not set.
mode.name: Set cleaning mode

navigation.description: Set the navigation mode: 1 for normal, 2 for extra care, 3 for deep. Defaults to normal if not set.
navigation.name: Set navigation mode

zone.description: Only supported on the Botvac D7. Name of the zone to clean. Defaults to no zone i.e. complete house cleanup.
zone.name: Name of the zone to clean (Only Botvac D7)

custom_cleaning.name: Zone cleaning action
